metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000773 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description: WordPress version 4.9.8 and earlier contains a CWE-20 Input Validationvulnerability in thumbnail processing that can result in remote codeexecution due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000600. This attackappears to be exploitable via thumbnail upload by an authenticated user andmay require additional plugins in order to be exploited however this hasnot been confirmed at this time.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
